pr_title: Show notification for when devtools build is slow

timeline.message: Show notification for when devtools build is slow

timeline.bodyText: glad to see the notification is being closed as soon as devtools is open!
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText:
what happens if notification.expire() is called before the notification is shown?
Will that call throw or will the subsequent call to Notification.Bus.notify show the notification?
replies.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: I tested by putting an extra notification.expire() statement before calling Notification.Bus.notify and verified that no notification is shown in that situation. Also verified that external projects where this step takes negligible time does not display the notification.
replies.author: helin24
